Description.Text: It is an ideal place for an escape to picturesque island of Poros, just 2 hours away from Athens. The hotels offers rooms with a splendid sea view and Poros town view. It also offers a fitness centre, a conference room and a private marina. The Xenia Poros Image Hotel also offers its guests 2 restaurants with a view over Poros town, where you can taste local and international gourmet dishes as well as start your day with a tasty breakfast. It also offers a beach bar on Neorio beach guests can enjoy coctails and snacks and get refreshed while chilling on the beach. On the beach of Neorio, guests can also enjoy free sunbeds and umbrellas.
Xenia Poros Image Hotel is located at the picturesque beach of Neorio, just minutes away from Poros town. It offers a unique view to Poros town and the beach of Neorio.
The restaurant offers breakfast, lunch and dinner.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
